theextravagant:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theextravagant:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theextravagant:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theextravagant:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theextravagant:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theextravagant:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theextravagant:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theextravagant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theextravagant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theextravagant:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theextravagant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theextravagant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberS.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theextravagant:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theextravagant:SlyStrike.NAME: Sly Strike
theextravagant:SlyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Lose !M! Strength at the end of your turn.

theextravagant:Clairvoyance.NAME: Clairvoyance
theextravagant:Clairvoyance.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL Discard any number of cards from your draw pile.
theextravagant:Clairvoyance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard any number of cards from your draw pile.

theextravagant:Triumph.NAME: Triumph
theextravagant:Triumph.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play 3 attacks in a row this turn, gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

theextravagant:Fence.NAME: Fence
theextravagant:Fence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn gain !theextravagant:REDUCED_BLOCK! Block.

theextravagant:Twostep.NAME: Twostep
theextravagant:Twostep.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Next turn draw !M! cards.

theextravagant:Reconsider.NAME: Reconsider
theextravagant:Reconsider.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card. If you discard an attack gain Strength equal to it's [E] cost.
theextravagant:Reconsider.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards. If you discard an attack gain Strength equal to it's [E] cost.

theextravagant:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
theextravagant:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: If the last card you play during your turn is a skill, the next card you play deals double damage. NL Ethereal.
theextravagant:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the last card you play during your turn is a skill, the next card you play deals double damage.

theextravagant:SnakeOil.NAME: Snake Oil
theextravagant:SnakeOil.DESCRIPTION: The next card you play applies !M! Poison and 1 Vulnerable whenever it deals unblocked attack damage. NL Exhaust.

theextravagant:Cutthroat.NAME: Cutthroat
theextravagant:Cutthroat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals triple damage if you played no cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

theextravagant:SwiftSwitch.NAME: Swift Switch
theextravagant:SwiftSwitch.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put 1 card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.
theextravagant:SwiftSwitch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Put 1 card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile. It costs 0 [E] until played.

theextravagant:ButtonUp.NAME: Button up
theextravagant:ButtonUp.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL While this card is in your draw pile, gain !B! Block at the start of your turn.

theextravagant:Pluck.NAME: Pluck
theextravagant:Pluck.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. They cost 0 this turn and exhaust when played.

theextravagant:SpontaneousStrike.NAME: Spontaneous Strike
theextravagant:SpontaneousStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. When drawn, this card costs 3 this turn.

theextravagant:DAMNATION.NAME: Damnation
theextravagant:DAMNATION.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play three cards that cost 2 [E] in a row deal !M! damage to all enemies.

theextravagant:RiskyStrike.NAME: Risky Strike
theextravagant:RiskyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add !M! Wounds on top of your draw pile.

theextravagant:ReSeek.NAME: Re-Seek
theextravagant:ReSeek.DESCRIPTION: Fetch !M! cards from your discard pile.

theextravagant:Aggression.NAME: Aggression
theextravagant:Aggression.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Double this cards damage this turn.

theextravagant:PuffUp.NAME: PuffUp
theextravagant:PuffUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Hp. NL Gain !M! Strength, lose !M! Strength at the end of your turn.

theextravagant:Sixteen_Tons.NAME: 16 Tons
theextravagant:Sixteen_Tons.DESCRIPTION: When this card is discarded, exhaust it and deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

theextravagant:ToolsOfTrickery.NAME: Tools of Trickery
theextravagant:ToolsOfTrickery.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, discard a random card and Fetch a card from your draw pile.

theextravagant:TwilightTone.NAME: Twilight Tone
theextravagant:TwilightTone.DESCRIPTION: While this card is in your discard pile, deal triple damage but you can only play attacks. NL Ethereal.
theextravagant:TwilightTone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL While this card is in your discard pile, deal triple damage, but you can only play attacks.

theextravagant:Retreat.NAME: Retreat
theextravagant:Retreat.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn put all cards in your hand into your draw pile and gain !B! Block for each.

theextravagant:WhiffOfMagic.NAME: Whiff of Magic
theextravagant:WhiffOfMagic.DESCRIPTION: Become theextravagant:Hexxed. NL Until next turn, whenever a card exhausts, heal !M! HP and gain !M! Temporary HP.

theextravagant:Flashback.NAME: Flashback
theextravagant:Flashback.DESCRIPTION: Put the next !M! cards you play on top of your draw pile.

theextravagant:DigUpJunk.NAME: Dig up Junk
theextravagant:DigUpJunk.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! random 0 [E] cost cards from your draw pile into your hand.

theextravagant:ZeroHero.NAME: Zero Hero
theextravagant:ZeroHero.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If the next card you play costs 0 [E]  , play it 3 times.

theextravagant:Glamour.NAME: Glamour
theextravagant:Glamour.DESCRIPTION: Gain [SE] [SE]  . NL Becomes unplayable until the end of the turn.
theextravagant:Glamour.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [SE] [SE] [SE]  . NL Becomes unplayable until the end of the turn.

theextravagant:Meditation.NAME: Meditation
theextravagant:Meditation.DESCRIPTION: Retain all 2 [E] cost cards at the end of this turn. NL They cost 0 [E] next turn.

theextravagant:FocusStab.NAME: Focus Stab
theextravagant:FocusStab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deals double damage if this costs 0.

theextravagant:Invocation.NAME: Invocation
theextravagant:Invocation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Fetch !M! card from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theextravagant:Invocation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Fetch !M! cards from your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theextravagant:GlyphOfSight.NAME: Glyph of Sight
theextravagant:GlyphOfSight.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Invocation into your hand.
theextravagant:GlyphOfSight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Invocation into your hand..

theextravagant:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
theextravagant:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

theextravagant:GlyphOfChoice.NAME: Glyph of Choice
theextravagant:GlyphOfChoice.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Accumulation into your hand.
theextravagant:GlyphOfChoice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Accumulation into your hand.

theextravagant:GlyphOfPower.NAME: Glyph of Power
theextravagant:GlyphOfPower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Acceleration into your hand.
theextravagant:GlyphOfPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Acceleration into your hand.

theextravagant:Preservation.NAME: Preservation
theextravagant:Preservation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Retain !M! card this turn. NL Exhaust.
theextravagant:Preservation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Retain !M! cards this turn. NL Exhaust.

theextravagant:GlyphOfTime.NAME: Glyph of Time
theextravagant:GlyphOfTime.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Preservation into your hand.
theextravagant:GlyphOfTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of each turn lose [SE] and add an theextravagant:Preservation into your hand.

theextravagant:Persistence.NAME: Persistence
theextravagant:Persistence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Persistence into your hand. NL Exhaust.

theextravagant:Strafe.NAME: Strafe
theextravagant:Strafe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block for each skill in your hand that costs 0 [E].

theextravagant:IronPlumes.NAME: Iron Plumes
theextravagant:IronPlumes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary HP. NL Whenever this card is drawn, increase the amount by 3 this combat. NL Exhaust.
